thumb.title: Rainy Knight - ERR (Official Music Video)
thumb.description: Instagram : Rainyknight_officialMiya made a determined decision to venture alone to the Legion headquarters to steal the energy needed to activate a spaceship and save Rainy Knight. Unfortunately, during the operation, he triggered the security system, leading to an interstellar escape. At the most critical moment, Miya accidentally discovered a spacetime mist that led to the Earth from the Mother Star.
